name: Maze Shifter (iesneto)
description:
Your world have been invaded by Tyranus. The only way to escape total war is accepting Tyranus bid:  surpass the ancients Mazes.

Become the Hero of your people, show Tyranus that you are the only one who is able to challenge the Maze.

This game is part of a project and is under development. Suggestions are very very welcome!
